m1.name: Acer Nitro 5 AN515-45 Gaming Laptop with AMD Ryzen™ 5 5600H processor up to 4.20 GHz, Full HD, IPS, 144Hz, 16GB, 512GB SSD, NVIDIA® GeForce GTX™ 1650 4GB, NO OS, Black
m1.description: Dominate the gaming world with the combined power of an AMD Ryzen processor and NVIDIA® GeForce GTX™ graphics processors. Configure your laptop for maximum speed and massive storage space with two slots for M.2 PCIe/SATA1 SSDs and up to 32GB of DDR4 3200 RAM.

m2.name: Mobile phone Apple iPhone 14 Pro, 128GB, 5G, Deep Purple
m2.description: A magical way to interact with the iPhone. A vital safety feature, designed to save lives. An innovative 48MP main camera. Plus a display twice as bright in sunlight. All powered by the most advanced chip in any smartphone.

m3.name: Solid State Drive (SSD) Samsung 980 1TB, NVMe, M.2.
m3.description: It's time to maximize your PC's potential with the 980. Whether you need a gaming boost or a smooth graphics-heavy workflow, the 980 is the smart choice for outstanding SSD performance, and it's all backed by an NVMe and PCIe 3.0 technology.

m4.name: Monitor Curved Gaming LED VA AOC AGON 35 in, WQHD, DisplayPort, 200Hz, HDR, NVIDIA G-Sync, Black/Red, Pivot, AG353UCG
m4.description: NVIDIA's G-SYNC HDR technology guarantees a smooth and fluid game even when the frames per second fall below a certain threshold, eliminating distortion. By aligning your graphics card's FPS with your monitor's refresh rate, G-SYNC delivers consistent performance whenever your system can't

m5.name: Consola PlayStation 5
m5.description: The PS5™ console unleashes new gaming possibilities that you never anticipated. Experience lightning-fast loading with an ultra-fast SSD, deeper immersion with haptic feedback compatibility, adaptive triggers and 3D sound, and a new generation of incredible PlayStation® games.
